testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): >take I gave you $550 The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 0 of money ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): >buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: >1 The coffee machine has: 950 of water 540 of milk 104 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups 554 of money ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): >buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: >2 The coffee machine has: 850 of water 465 of milk 100 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups 557 of money ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): >buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: >3 The coffee machine has: 1000 of water 440 of milk 108 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups 556 of money ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m The coffee machine has: 1200 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of money Write action (buy, fill, take): >fill Write how many ml of water do you want to add: >2001 Write how many ml of milk do you want to add: >510 Write how many grams of coffee beans do you want to add: >101 Write how many disposable cups of coffee do you want to add: >21 The coffee machine has: 3201 of water 1050 of milk 221 of coffee beans 30 of disposable cups 550 of money
